## MessageRow class

A single row of the `MessageBar`<!-- -->. Use `MessageBar.remove(row)` to remove it.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class MessageRow 
```

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `MessageRow` class.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [message](./bge-core.messagerow.message.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [Message](./bge-core.message.md) | Displayed message in the row. |
